## StringRuleConfig type

Configuration type for string-validation rules

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type StringRuleConfig<TRegExp, TValue, TRuleConfig extends RuleConfig> = TRuleConfig & {
    regex?: TRegExp;
    values?: TValue;
};
```
